item.description:
Sorry, as of April 20th, tickets for this event are sold out.

Please purchase tickets for $12 at:
http://nhpriraflatow2012.eventbrite.com/
Veteran NPR science correspondent and award-winning journalist Ira Flatow, host of Science Friday, is coming to UNH Durham, NH. He’ll be interviewed on stage by NHPR’s All Things Considered host Brady Carlson and will take questions from the audience.
Talk Of The Nation Science Friday, can be heard in New Hampshire on NHPR every Friday at 2pm. Each week Ira brings radio and internet listeners worldwide a lively, informative discussion on science, technology, health, space and the environment. Mixing his passion for science with a tendency toward being “a bit of a ham,” Flatow describes his work as the challenge “to make science and technology a topic for discussion around the dinner table.”

The event begins at 6 pm, in the Strafford Room, Memorial Union Building, UNH Durham.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: (Sold Out) Ira Flatow, host of NPR's Science Friday @UNH
